name: Frontline Warfare: FPS Battle
description:
Frontline Warfare: FPS Battle is a down right FPS arcade shooter featuring intuitive controls that are designed to cater casual to mid-core FPS enthusiasts. The game features several levels with consistently increasing level of difficulty, to keep things challenging and fresh.

With several modern weapons to unlock as you progress, and numerous challenging levels to complete; Frontline Warfare: FPS Battle is a must have for an entertaining casual first person shooting experience.
